summary.span: 代表一組資料命令和一個資料庫連接，用來填入 並更新資料來源。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 做為橋樑以及擷取和儲存資料的資料來源。The serves as a bridge between a and data source for retrieving and saving data. 藉由使用提供此橋接器將資料載入到資料來源，並使用傳送中所做的變更回資料來源。The provides this bridge by using to load data from the data source into the , and using to send changes made in the back to the data source. 當填滿，它已經存在，如果會建立適當的資料表和資料行傳回的資料。When the fills a , it will create the appropriate tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 不過，主索引鍵資訊不會納入以隱含方式建立的結構描述除非屬性設定為。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 您也可以建立的結構描述，包括主索引鍵資訊的詳細資訊，再填入資料使用。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 將現有條件約束加入至資料集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md). 請注意，有些 OLE DB 提供者，包括 MSDataShape 提供者不會傳回基底資料表或主索引鍵資訊。Note that some OLE DB providers, including the MSDataShape provider, do not return base table or primary key information. 因此，無法正確地設定上建立的任何屬性。Therefore, the cannot correctly set the property on any created . 在這些情況下您應該明確指定的資料表中的主索引鍵。In these cases you should explicitly specify primary keys for tables in the . 也包含， ， ， ，和屬性，以加速的載入和更新的資料。The also includes the , , , , and properties to facilitate the loading and updating of data. 當您建立的執行個體，屬性會設為其初始值。When you create an instance of , properties are set to their initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會使用，並，以選取記錄從存取資料來源，並填入與選取的資料列。The following example uses the , and , to select records from an Access data source, and populate a with the selected rows. 區域分布再傳回。The filled is then returned. 若要這麼做，方法傳遞初始化，連接字串，而是在 SQL SELECT 陳述式的查詢字串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作開啟和關閉如果它尚未開啟。This implementation of the opens and closes an if it is not already open. 這非常有用的應用程式，必須呼叫二或多個方法物件。This can be useful in an application that must call the method for two or more objects. 如果是已開啟，您必須明確呼叫或是**處置**將它關閉。If the is already open, you must explicitly call or **Dispose** to close it. 當您建立的執行個體，下列的讀取/寫入屬性設定為下列的初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |屬性Properties|Initial valueInitial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 您可以變更上述任一個屬性，透過單獨呼叫屬性的值。You can change the value of either of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 陳述式或預存程序以從資料集中刪除資料錄。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure for deleting records from the data set.

value.span: ，用來在 期間刪除資料來源中的資料錄，這些資料錄對應至 中刪除的資料列。

span.span: An used during to delete records in the data source that correspond to deleted rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間，如果沒有設定這個屬性，而主索引鍵資訊是存在於，則如果您將可以自動產生屬性，然後使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然後，您未設定任何其他命令產生的。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此層代 」 邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 當指派至先前建立，則不複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護先前建立的參考物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定和屬性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 、ADO 物件和來源資料表名稱，加入或重新整理 中的資料列，以符合在 ADO 或 中的資料列。

span.span: Adds or refreshes rows in the to match those in an ADO or object using the specified , ADO object, and source table name.

returns.span: 成功加入至 或在其中重新整理的資料列數目。

span.span: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) 與 ADO.NET 之間的連結是單向作業，在於您可以將資料複製到 ADO ，但必須由 ADO.NET 處理資料的任何更新。The link between ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) and ADO.NET is a one-way operation in that you can copy data from ADO to the , but any updates to the data must be handled by ADO.NET. 藉由呼叫方法逐一查看經過多個結果`NextRecordset`方法`Recordset`，關閉輸入`Recordset`完成作業。The method iterates through multiple results by calling the `NextRecordset` method on the `Recordset`, closing the input `Recordset` on completion of the operation. 作業會將資料列加入到指定的目的地物件中建立物件如果它不存在。The operation adds the rows to the specified destination object in the , creating the object if it does not already exist. 當您建立物件，作業通常會建立只有資料行名稱中繼資料。When you create a object, the operation ordinarily creates only column name metadata. 不過，如果屬性設定為`AddWithKey`，也會建立適當的主索引鍵和條件約束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果主索引鍵資訊有，任何重複的資料列已調解，而且只能出現一次，其對應於。If primary key information is present, any duplicate rows are reconciled and only appear one time in the that corresponds to the . 主索引鍵資訊可能會設定透過，藉由指定屬性，或藉由設定屬性設`AddWithKey`。Primary key information may be set either through , by specifying the property of the , or by setting the property to `AddWithKey`. 若要正常搭配.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB`AddWithKey`需要藉由設定 DBPROP_UNIQUEROWS 屬性，取得必要的主索引鍵資訊，然後判斷 哪些資料行是主索引鍵的原生 OLE DB 提供者藉由檢查中的 dbcolumn_keycolumn 來的資料行**IColumnsRowset**。To function correctly with the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB, `AddWithKey` requires the native OLE DB provider to obtain required primary key information by setting the DBPROP_UNIQUEROWS property, and then determine which columns are primary key columns by examining DBCOLUMN_KEYCOLUMN in the **IColumnsRowset**. 或者使用者可能會明確設定每個 primary key 條件約束。Alternatively the user may explicitly set the primary key constraints on each . 這確保與現有資料錄相符的連入資料錄是更新，而不是附加。This ensures that incoming records that match existing records are updated instead of appended. 如果 傳回 OUTER JOIN 的結果，則 `DataAdapter` 便不會為產生的 設定 值。If the returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 您必須明確定義以確定正確解析重複的資料列的主索引鍵。You must explicitly define the primary key to make sure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 定義主索引鍵](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 如果`Recordset`已關閉，然後再啟動作業，不會產生錯誤。If the `Recordset` is closed before the starting of the operation, no error results. 這是需要處理多個結果，因為查詢不會傳回資料列會指出所關閉`Recordset`。This is required for handling of multiple results, because queries that do not return rows are indicated by a closed `Recordset`. 只會呼叫`NextRecordset`上的封閉型`Recordset`然後繼續處理。The just calls `NextRecordset` on the closed `Recordset` and continues processing. 如果遇到錯誤，則在填入資料集，發生錯誤之前加入的資料列會保留在。If an error is encountered while populating the data set, rows added before the occurrence of the error remain in the . 剩下的作業已中止。The rest of the operation is aborted. 如果物件在填入遇到重複的資料行，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式名稱 」*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2 」、 「*columnname*3"，依此類推。If the object encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on. 如果內送資料包含未命名的資料行，它們會放在根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，依此類推。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 當多個結果集加入至放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 其他結果集的命名方式將整數值附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，「 資料表 」、"Table1"、"Table2"，等等。）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on.). 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應該要確定這些命名模式 je v konfliktu 不會發生。Applications that use column and table names should make sure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. 值，在 ADO`Recordset`或是`Record`物件會轉換為通用語言執行階段類型中的儲存體。Values in ADO `Recordset` or `Record` objects are converted to common language runtime types for storage in the . > [!NOTE] > 這個多載方法會隱含呼叫`Close`ADO 物件填入作業完成時。This overload of the method implicitly calls `Close` on the ADO object when the fill operation is complete. 下列範例會使用填滿使用 ADO`Recordset`也就是 ADO`Record`物件。The following example uses an to fill a using an ADO `Recordset` that is an ADO `Record` object. 這個範例假設您已建立 ADO`RecordSet`和`Record`物件。This example assumes that you have created an ADO `RecordSet` and `Record` object. ```vb Dim custDA As OleDbDataAdapter = New OleDbDataAdapter() Dim custDS As DataSet = New DataSet 'Use ADO objects from ADO library (msado15.dll) imported ' as.NET library ADODB.dll using TlbImp.exe Dim adoConn As ADODB.Connection = New ADODB.Connection() Dim adoRS As ADODB.Recordset = New ADODB.Recordset() adoConn.Open("Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=Northwind;Integrated Security=SSPI;", "", "", -1) adoRS.Open("SELECT * FROM Customers", adoConn, ADODB.CursorTypeEnum.adOpenForwardOnly, ADODB.LockTypeEnum.adLockReadOnly, 1) custDA.Fill(custDS, adoRS, "Customers") adoConn.Close() ``` ```csharp OleDbDataAdapter custDA = new OleDbDataAdapter(); DataSet custDS = new DataSet(); //Use ADO objects from ADO library (msado15.dll) imported // as.NET library ADODB.dll using TlbImp.exe ADODB.Connection adoConn = new ADODB.Connection(); ADODB.Recordset adoRS = new ADODB.Recordset(); adoConn.Open("Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=Northwind;Integrated Security=SSPI;", "", "", -1); adoRS.Open("SELECT * FROM Customers", adoConn, ADODB.CursorTypeEnum.adOpenForwardOnly, ADODB.LockTypeEnum.adLockReadOnly, 1); custDA.Fill(custDS, adoRS, "Customers"); adoConn.Close(); ```

span.span: The source table is invalid.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 陳述式或預存程序，用來插入新記錄到資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to insert new records into the data source.

value.span: ，用來在 期間插入資料來源中的資料錄，這些資料錄對應至 中的新資料列。

span.span: An used during to insert records in the data source that correspond to new rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間，如果沒有設定這個屬性，而主索引鍵資訊是存在於，則如果您將可以自動產生屬性，然後使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然後，您未設定任何其他命令產生的。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此層代 」 邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 當指派至先前建立，則不複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護先前建立的參考物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果執行此命令會傳回資料列，這些資料列可能會加入至視您的設定方式而定屬性物件。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the depending on how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定和屬性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生在已經針對資料來源執行命令後的 期間。

span.span: Occurs during after a command is executed against the data source.

summary.span: 系統會嘗試進行更新。

span.span: The attempt to update is made.

summary.span: 因此便發生這個事件。

span.span: Therefore, the event occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用，有兩個每個更新的資料列就會發生的事件。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 執行順序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值會移至 參數值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 3. 執行命令。The command executes. 4. 如果命令設定為`FirstReturnedRecord`，將第一個傳回的結果會放在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果沒有輸出參數，它們會放在。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 7. 呼叫 。 is called. ## Examples 下列範例所示和所使用的事件。The following example shows the and events being used. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An that is used during to select records from data source for placement in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指派至先前建立，則不複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 維護先前建立的參考物件。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果會傳回任何資料列中，任何資料表會加入至，並會引發任何例外狀況。If the returns no rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定和屬性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它會假設您已經建立物件。It assumes that you have already created an object.
